text: don‚Äôt miss out on this opportunity to experience this exquisite fragrance!! lattafa yara for women eau de parfum spray is an exquisite fragrance that evokes a sense of elegance and sophistication. the scent is captivating, with a perfect blend of floral and musky notes that leave a lasting impression. upon first application, you are greeted with a burst of fresh and vibrant floral accords, reminiscent of a blooming garden in spring. the top notes of bergamot, blackcurrant, and peach add a touch of fruity sweetness, enhancing the overall allure of the fragrance. as the perfume settles, the heart notes of jasmine, rose, and violet begin to emerge, enveloping you in a delicate and feminine aroma. these floral notes are beautifully balanced, creating a harmonious blend that is both alluring and comforting. the base notes of musk, amber, and vanilla provide a warm and sensual foundation to the fragrance. they add depth and longevity to the scent, ensuring that it lingers on your skin throughout the day. lattafa yara for women eau de parfum spray is a versatile fragrance that can be worn for any occasion. whether it's a casual day out or a special evening event, this perfume will enhance your confidence and leave a lasting impression. i highly recommend lattafa yara for women eau de parfum spray to anyone who appreciates the beauty of floral fragrances with a touch of sensuality. it is a captivating scent that is sure to turn heads and leave a lasting impression. don't miss out on the opportunity to experience this exquisite fragrance.

Luxurious and feminine scent! I was looking to replace my usual perfume when I came across this one on Amazon. It caught my attention because it was a top choice and it was super affordable. My previous perfumes cost an average of $50-$80. I was skeptical at first but I saw so many positive reviews. I've never bought a Middle Eastern product before, but I'm glad I did because I absolutely love this scent üíØ. It has such an amazing aroma: a sweet floral and vanilla scent that feels light and feminine. The scent lingers on your clothes and doesn't vanish quickly. It's long-lasting and smells luxurious. Best of all, it was super affordable. I'm going to try the other scents. ‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏èüëå

Smells divine üíï I absolutely love this perfume. It smells fresh, clean, and floral but it‚Äôs not overpowering. It‚Äôs perfect for everyday. Sweet and soft smells good, is sweet but fresh. Works well if you layer up with something stronger or with a little more body. I do notice the fragrance fades quickly. Works like a body splash for me.

intoxicating and very high quality! I was honestly scared to buy perfume online not knowing firsthand what it would smell like, but I am so glad I purchased this perfume! I have no specific words to describe the smell, but if I had to choose, I would say the perfume smells very feminine, clean, refreshing, yet intoxicating! It reminds me of a raspberry scent, and I would totally buy again. The quality of the perfume makes the price worth it, and it feels very fancy to own something so simple, knowing you‚Äôll smell good whenever it‚Äôs put to use!

smells bomb this was a blind purchase TikTok made me buy it, but it‚Äôs so worth it, it smells so good, if you pair it with vanilla lotion it makes it smell even better, I paired it with the vanilla cashmere from EOS and I got so many compliments, it lasts pretty long, and is a good price. The only thing that was ‚Äúwrong‚Äù was that my perfume had a small scuff on it but I don‚Äôt mind that still 5 stars for me! (The scuff is on the second photo, very small and hard to see)

My honest opinion okay so I do like this fragrance, it does smell a lot like the sold spray (the vanilla caramel and pistachio one) but I like this better than that. It doesn't smell as yogurty. It doesn't smell like strawberry milk like people think it does idk where that is coming from maybe smelling something I am not. But this is really sweet and does have a hint of fruity but I mean a tiny hint. It is a solid vanilla scented perfume and it lasts a long time like 6+ on me if you sniff your arm but does last a while. Like definitely worth the price just for that alone. The bottle is gorgeous and packaging too. I do recommend this for girlies who love vanilla scented sprays who also enjoy the sold stuff. I do wonder if the smell will change as it sits. But overall it's a nice fragrance.

Love this perfume! I loved this perfume. This was a blind purchase but I don't regret it. You can definitely smell the tropical notes and gourmand but also a powdery smell that even though I'm not a fan of, it balances perfectly with the other notes. Some say it smells like a strawberry milkshake and I honestly didn't find any of that. It has good projection but nothing crazy. Maybe it depends on your pH. On me, it lasts between 6 to 7 hours. But compared to other perfumes I own that cost more, I say this is not bad at all and you can layer it with a body mist or body oil to make it last longer as I did. Overall a good purchase. Only complaint is that packaging did not come in perfect condition. Aside from that, I totally recommend it.

I‚Äôm in love with this perfume‚Ä¶ I never thought in 1 million years that I would actually like a perfume, EDP, I had not smelled in person and had ordered off the internet. I could go on and on and on because I know everybody has a different smell when they spray perfumes, but have to say next to my signature scent Ralph Lauren Romance, this is going to be my go-to perfume!!!!

Lasts forever first of all, smells amazing. It‚Äôs like a slightly fruity, floral gourmand. It does not smell like strawberry milk like some people are saying, but it smells so good! It‚Äôs a very feminine scent. I wore it to a concert last night where it was super hot and sweaty, and then I went home and took a shower, and I could still smell the perfume! Smells wonderful due to menopause, my chemistry has changed so I cannot wear a lot of perfumes I have bought in the past. I read reviews and figured I would try it. I absolutely love it and got compliments on how nice I smell. I ordered two more sets of three and got rid of all the other fragrances I have. This will be my number one now.

Wow, this was a blind buy for me and wow! It smells divine! The only thing I can say is the projection isn‚Äôt there until someone gets close enough to smell it. Repurchase this smells amazing! I get so many compliments when I wear this, it‚Äôs ridiculous. My family member smelled it and immediately asked me to buy one for them. Honest review: I was easily influenced by this TikTok viral perfume, so I had to try it. First, I must say, it comes in a lovely packaging and a beautiful bottle design. clean girl vibes. great for everyday and layering. yara went viral and i had to try it. it did not disappoint. i'm not a big fan of super sweet smelling perfume. this is a beautiful lotion-like fresh out of the shower vibes with a light musk base and dare i say a touch of black pepper at the bottom. clean, refreshing, not overpowering, not a strawberry milkshake lol but lighter and not sickening sweet either. maybe a touch of gourmand. very original not really smelled anything like this before.

smells so good exactly like riri i love this perfume and it is the go-to. it's hard finding a nice good fragrance that you like and i had riri by rihanna and i always wanted something like that and when i got this yara perfume immediately it smells just like riri but stronger. it‚Äôs not overpowering it‚Äôs just right. it lasts very long which i was surprised because vanilla perfumes normally don‚Äôt. definitely will be getting this for the rest of my life üòÇ

One of my most complimented perfumes! I don‚Äôt normally wear perfumes that get compliments but I got three compliments one night at work and was pleasantly surprised by this. It‚Äôs light and powdery so it‚Äôs a nice light fragrance, it does smell powdery. Just get this one, you won‚Äôt be disappointed! The only bad thing about this fragrance is that it doesn‚Äôt last very long. But for the price, I‚Äôm totally okay with reapplying every few hours. The scent is gorgeous, I get so many compliments on this. Such value for the fragrance.

Lattafa Yara - smells like a fake Victoria's Secret. Lattafa Yara is a disappointing fragrance that fails to live up to its exotic branding. The scent is overpowering and artificial, lacking the subtlety and complexity one would expect from a quality perfume. For a fragrance that aims to make a statement, Lattafa Yara delivers the wrong message entirely.

Pleasant, subtle scent. I don‚Äôt feel like this can be oversprayed. The scent is subtle, sweet, and not offensive. I like it but it doesn‚Äôt really ‚Äúwow‚Äù me. This is a safe purchase for people who work in offices because it isn‚Äôt overpowering.

A luxurious and timeless fragrance! The media could not be loaded. I am absolutely in love with Versace Bright Crystal! From the moment I opened the beautifully designed box, I knew I was in for a treat. The bottle itself is a piece of art ‚Äì elegant and sophisticated, perfectly capturing the essence of the fragrance within. The scent is a delightful blend that feels both fresh and clean, yet luxuriously classy. It's perfect for any occasion, whether you're heading to a formal event or just want to feel special on a regular day. It is sweet and floral with the perfect balance that is both light and captivating without being overpowering. I prefer to have a light and airy scent and this hits every point. What I appreciate most about Versace Bright Crystal is its versatility. It transitions seamlessly from day to night, making it a staple in my collection. Every time I wear it, I receive compliments and inquiries about what perfume I'm wearing. It truly makes me feel confident and elegant. If you're looking for a fragrance that combines beauty, class, and a fresh, clean scent, look no further than Versace Bright Crystal. It has become my go-to perfume, and I cannot recommend it enough. This is a must-have for anyone who loves to feel luxurious and sophisticated every day!

Original and smells good. I did research and thus far my bottle appears real. All three scents competed with each other for the next several hours, giving me a headache while creating a cloud of smell around me. After about 6 hours, it died down enough to not be overpowering and allowed the sandalwood, amber, and a hint of vanilla to shine while also calming the powdery musk scent. As for its effects, I don't know. I have used the original and it worked incredibly well, so theoretically, this one should work too. I just haven't used it around others because of how strong it is.

scent got worse when i first received this scent last summer, i really liked it. it was a sweet, pleasant musk scent that was really nice and great for the price. i rotate through scents and lost track of the bottle for a bit so there were a few months that i couldn't find it. when i found and went to use it again, i was surprised to find the scent had changed and it was now this awful armpit kind of smell. i thought maybe there was just something up with me, that maybe allergies or a recent sickness was affecting my sense of smell. but after several months of trying to like this scent, i'm throwing in the towel. i don't know if the fact that it's a roll on and you're technically getting your skin cells and body oils on the roller ball might have reacted with the perfume to change the chemistry of it, but whatever happened i am sad to consider it completely unusable now. it may be cheap, but a perfume that is largely going to go to waste after a couple months is not worth any price in my book.

haha wooooowwww i don‚Äôt usually write reviews, but had to share my experience today. i figured i would try this to see what all the hype was about. i wasn‚Äôt exactly hopeful, but it‚Äôs viral for a reason, right? i just purchased this last night. i put it on before an event this morning and ‚Äúregulars‚Äù who are married men and don‚Äôt usually speak more than a few words to me were holding conversations with me. nothing inappropriate or flirty by any means, but i know i typically come across as unapproachable and i was certainly approached more than usual. i‚Äôve known these people several years now and this is the first time we‚Äôve had conversations! coincidence? possibly. fast forward to this afternoon. my s/o and i had an argument last night. typically, he‚Äôs too annoyed to bother with me if we are upset with each other but he was following me from room to room unable to keep his hands off me. i had to push him off and ask what his deal was. then i stopped, started laughing, and put two and two together. i mean it has to be this perfume. it has to! this man has never been an octopus like this! ever. asking me to kiss him over and over!?! i don‚Äôt know. get it. just get it. i‚Äôm not that outgoing or friendly so today‚Äôs attention has nothing to do with my sparkling personality.

The smell is so addicting but ... ~ the perfume oil smells exquisite, it gives off a sweet musky smell. It's super addicting even I can't stop smelling my own wrist. My husband sitting on the bed noticed the smell right away & told me, \What's that smell?\ I told him it's my new perfume I ordered. He complimented it, saying it smells super nice. Of course, I smiled all proud because I was in complete shock; he noticed it so quickly without me telling him first. I wanted to put it to the test since everyone on TikTok was raving all about this perfume oil. So, I wore it to the Fresno Hmong New Year. - Overall experience, no one came up to me! Which was a bummer because I'm starting to doubt this perfume. I had my makeup, hair, and complete traditional outfit on too. The only thing that happened was a few men (from mid-28-og) were concerned for me and asked if I was okay. For all my ladies out there wearing heels will understand, I was at the Hmong New Year for 5 hours & couldn't walk in heels anymore, so of course, I took them off and walked barefoot around the festival. :) The true definition of beauty is pain. My thoughts on this product: ~ It doesn't make men go too crazy like on social media. ~ Must apply every time once the smell starts to abate. I apply every 2 hours. ~ It does make you feel super confident & in your feminine energy after you apply it. The smell is similar to those Victoria's Secret perfumes, but the only difference is Pure Instinct has pheromones, which attracts people while Victoria's Secret perfume doesn't have. *** For all my ladies: Men are attracted to sweet & delicate scents, so if you're debating on buying this product, I say purchase it right away & put it to your knowledge. Everyone has their own certain unique smell, so the experience will be different from mine. Not only is this oil delightful in smell, it gives off a sexual arousal. Even I was quite turned on while applying this on. ***

Hence, I embarked on a quest for a worthy successor and settled for this roll-on variant. While it does the job adequately, it lacks the sheer magic of its predecessor. Instantly, her arousal surged, reigniting our passion without delay. Such is the power of a well-crafted scent! Funny stories aside, this Pure Instinct pheromone cologne is a very nice addition to my nightlife escapades. Maybe takes some time to work. I applied this 3 times; twice when I was about to go to bed, then once in the morning. I did notice that hubby at first rolled closer to my side of the bed, but I think because we were so tired, nothing transpired. I know pheromones work with the chemicals in your existing pH and hormones, and because I am currently menstruating, maybe that has something to do with it not working on him at this time? (I‚Äôm a nurse, but I‚Äôm not sure how this works tbh). Early this morning, I reapplied, and he didn‚Äôt notice. Zip. Nada. He held my hand and was playful, but nothing out of the ordinary. Lol, maybe his olfactory nerves are shot. Hahahaha. I gave it 4 stars because of the scent itself. It has a wonderfully pleasant and warm sweet vanilla aroma, with a hint of citrus. Nothing too overpowering. Over time, the scent fades and sort of adjusts to your own. It‚Äôs really nice. About to hit the gym with my husband, with the pheromone perfume still on‚Ä¶so tbd. We‚Äôll see if I get compliments. Edited to add: I‚Äôm off my period and used it again. Hubby has been a tiny bit more affectionate with me. When I hit the gym, someone shyly came up to me and asked when I would be done with my set. Then it just seemed like a decent amount of guys flocked near me (about 3-4, and I think a couple of them were gym buddies). None of them spoke to me (I‚Äôm sure seeing my wedding band may have turned them off), but they stuck around until I was done lifting dumbbells. They scattered soon after I left. On the train, a guy kept staring at me. Very creepy, as he would smoke his cigarette then stare. I just kept scrolling on my phone until my stop came, and was glad we had different stops. When I got home, hubby was his same usual self, but in bed, he kept trying to touch me even if I wasn‚Äôt exactly in the mood! Hahahaha. Maybe I just needed to be off my period for it to work.

It‚Äôs‚Ä¶interesting the scent reminds me of a really expensive perfume that a friend of mine had given me a few years ago. I don‚Äôt smell anything remotely close to rose or citrus. It‚Äôs a very warm, musky scent. It‚Äôs just ‚Äúokay‚Äù as far as scent goes. Now, for the really interesting part. I never told my husband I purchased this. I put it on immediately after opening. Applying it to my wrists, behind my ears, between my breasts, behind my knees, and in the creases where my arms bend. It sounds like a lot, but very minimal amounts were applied. I let it sit and absorb into my skin, and it was a very warm, fall/winter scent on me. I know it depends on your pH levels, etc., for the way it smells on each person and when. But the minute my husband was around me, he could not keep his hands off me!!! He kept saying how good I smelled, kissing me, and well‚Ä¶you can guess what happened later on lol. He is typically not like this at all, so it took me by surprise! I decided to wear it out while running errands and had several men opening doors for me, standing close to me, and even telling me how good I smelled! So, as far as effectiveness goes, I give it a 10/10 for sure! Scent-wise, I think it depends on your body, but it definitely smelled really nice once it absorbed into my skin.

smells amazing...at 1st... i didn't buy this to attempt to attract men lol 1st of all i'm happily married so no need but i thought that since it said it will smell different on everybody that it would kinda give me my own signature scent plus smell good obviously. well, it's inexpensive so that's good, it smells delicious so that's good...what's the bad??? after it's been on a couple hours, it goes from a smell you want to cover yourself in to a grandma perfume musk that you want to run from so my tip is this...only use a small amount! the less the better because it's very strong so you're gonna smell great with little product behind the ears and a dot under each wrist that way after a few hours and that smell fades to a musky one, you can't really smell that. whatever you do though, if you are out somewhere and notice hours later that you can smell the musk on your wrist or wherever...do not reapply thinking you will get the great scent again because you will...but when that fades, oh boy you better head for the retirement home lmao!

smells irresistible I recently tried Pure Instinct Crave Roll-On, the original pheromone-infused essential oil, and I'm absolutely delighted with the results! This roll-on has quickly become my go-to scent for both everyday wear and special occasions. The fragrance is simply intoxicating ‚Äì a blend of light florals and citrus notes with a hint of musk that is both alluring and captivating. I love how it subtly enhances my natural scent, creating an aura of confidence and sensuality wherever I go. Plus, the convenient roll-on applicator makes it easy to apply just the right amount of fragrance, whether I'm dabbing it on my pulse points or layering it with other perfumes. The pheromone-infused formula adds an extra layer of allure, attracting attention and sparking connections with those around me. Since incorporating Pure Instinct Crave into my beauty routine, I've received countless compliments on its irresistible scent and noticed a positive response from those around me. Whether you're looking to enhance your natural allure or simply indulge in a luxurious fragrance experience, I highly recommend giving Pure Instinct Crave Roll-On a try ‚Äì it's a must-have addition to any perfume collection!

I absolutely love! I recently purchased the Pure Instinct Crave Roll-On Pheromone Infused Essential Oil Perfume Cologne for her, and I have been loving it! This beautifully scented perfume is infused with pheromones, adding an extra layer of allure and intrigue to my daily routine. The roll-on application makes it easy to apply the fragrance precisely where I want it, allowing me to control the intensity of the scent. The 0.34 fl oz size is perfect for on-the-go use and is TSA ready, making it convenient for travel. The scent of Pure Instinct Crave is captivating and sensual, with delicate floral notes and hints of citrus. I find that it's perfect for everyday wear, adding a touch of sophistication and mystery to any outfit. I appreciate that this perfume is made with essential oils, which provides a natural and long-lasting fragrance that blends beautifully with my body chemistry. The addition of pheromones adds an extra element of attraction, making me feel confident and empowered whenever I wear it. Overall, I highly recommend the Pure Instinct Crave Roll-On Pheromone Infused Essential Oil Perfume Cologne for her to anyone looking for a unique and captivating fragrance. It's a great addition to any perfume collection and is sure to turn heads wherever you go.

pro: smells good con: bad rash I first bought this perfume last year, smelled it and really liked it! Shortly after, I took it out with me in my bag on a night out. My bag was stolen that night with all of my contents... I wonder if my great scent is what lured the burglar to me... I repurchased this perfume in the following months after the scowl finally wore off of my face from my prior experience. Still smells great! Woo! The roller is a bit abrasive on the skin of my neck but... it's fine... Oops ... no it isn't apparently. I put it on my neck Friday night, and maybe it's because I used several passes of the scent on my flesh, but I broke into a horrible bumpy rash on my entire neck up into my ears and hairline, 360‚Å∞. It burns, it itches, I am reading ancient stories of our creation from the Braille novels on my skin... It's been almost a week and the rash has not subsided. Very sad and disappointed as I will now never use this product on my neck again which was really the only place that mattered for me. RIP.

man magnet listen, when i want a boost in attention from men for whatever reason... this is my go-to! i'm a perfume fanatic. as far as the scent is concerned, i don't hate it. however, i'm not the biggest fan of it. i wouldn't say that it stinks, it is just not a scent profile that i would gravitate towards. it is light enough to wear with other perfumes. i typically place this rollerball perfume behind my ear. this is just to not disturb my other fragrance that i have on. perfume is subjective anyways so don't go off of my scent review. i will say that the dry down is different than what it smells like in the bottle. leans a little sweeter than the musk smell that it opens with. now to the most important part. men go out of their way to do something for me. i can't sing to save my life. this man told me i had a beautiful singing voice. i side-eyed him so hard, but i remembered that i had this on. men will let the door close behind them as they walk away, see me walking to it, and come back to open it. i do not get this on a regular day. i wore this for a couple romantic interests and when i say they could not keep their hands off me i absolutely mean that. i got turned every way but loose (in a good way). one was a cuddle type of person and i swear he kept me in a headlock all night long. the other does not like to cuddle as much, but just couldn't help but snuggle up. i'm not one for coincidences, so i will put my trust in this product. it definitely does its job. just give it a try and see where the night might land you ;)

doesn't really work like a pheromone perfume i had high hopes for this product and i'm disappointed. pheromone perfumes/oils change based on your chemistry, or something like that. the oil smells good but it's too strong and more like a musk. it doesn't change at all and it's not long lasting. 3 stars because it did come in on time, there wasn't any damage to the parcel, and the product doesn't smell bad. overall, it just wasn't for me. i had my boyfriend smell it on me too and he didn't have a reaction.

It's great! So this perfume is definitely very unique and very interesting. When I first unpackaged it and smelled the bottle, it was definitely a strong, musky smell that almost smelled like pine... but after I put it on and rubbed it in (and sat with it for a few minutes) it definitely became more of a sweeter, lighter smell. This is definitely an intimate perfume that does smell nice if you're the type to like those kinds of things, but do I think it will attract your boyfriend, girlfriend, or spouse? No. I think that all the hype around this perfume is just the sellers convincing us that it will make us more attractive. With that being said, I think that when we apply this perfume it gives us a confidence boost which (might) make us more attractive in some way. This product was well packaged and is a fairly decent size, and it is a full bottle when you first get it.

Interesting, but if I'm being honest... Okay, so I purchased this, and I'll be honest, I'm not sure. I enjoy the scent; it's pretty and spicy, and I am very picky about scents. I have received a lot of compliments and people asking me what I'm wearing since purchasing it. I even had a random lady stop me in the grocery store to tell me I smelled good and asked what I was wearing. It was very flattering. However, I layer it with other scents, so I don't think the compliments are on this alone. Also, all of the compliments have almost exclusively been from other women. Lastly, my significant other has shown zero increased interest or heightened sexual attraction, which was the purpose of me ordering it. I still enjoy it and wear it often.

A refreshing and timeless scent, Nautica Voyage Eau de Toilette for Men has quickly become one of my favorite fragrances. Here‚Äôs why I‚Äôm so impressed with this scent: 1. Invigorating fragrance: The scent of Nautica Voyage is absolutely invigorating. It opens with fresh, green, and apple notes, giving it a crisp and clean feel. The middle notes of mimosa blended with water lotus create a light and refreshing vibe, while the base notes of cedarwood, musk, and amber add a warm and masculine finish. 2. Long-lasting: One of the standout features of this cologne is its longevity. Just a couple of sprays in the morning keep me smelling fresh throughout the entire day. It‚Äôs rare to find an Eau de Toilette with such staying power, and Nautica Voyage delivers impressively in this regard. 3. Versatile: This fragrance is incredibly versatile. It‚Äôs perfect for any occasion, whether you‚Äôre heading to the office, going out for a casual day with friends, or having a romantic evening out. The scent is light enough for daytime wear yet sophisticated enough for evening occasions. 4. Excellent value: Nautica Voyage offers excellent value for the quality. It‚Äôs priced affordably compared to many other high-end fragrances, making it an accessible option for anyone looking to elevate their scent game without breaking the bank. 5. Attractive packaging: The packaging is sleek and stylish. The bottle has a nautical design that reflects the fresh, marine-inspired scent inside. It looks great on my dresser and adds a touch of elegance to my grooming collection. 6. Compliment magnet: I‚Äôve received numerous compliments since I started wearing Nautica Voyage. It‚Äôs always nice when people notice and appreciate your fragrance, and this cologne consistently gets positive remarks from both men and women. 7. Non-overpowering: The scent is perfectly balanced and not overpowering. It has a subtle yet noticeable presence that makes it ideal for those who prefer a fragrance that‚Äôs not too strong but still makes a statement. Overall, Nautica Voyage Eau de Toilette for Men is a fantastic choice for anyone seeking a fresh, versatile, and long-lasting fragrance. It combines quality, affordability, and a scent that‚Äôs sure to leave a lasting impression. I highly recommend giving it a try.

Perfectly balanced and refreshing scent for everyday wear, Nautica Voyage Eau de Toilette for men has quickly become my go-to fragrance for everyday wear. Here‚Äôs why this scent deserves a full five-star rating: Fresh and invigorating scent: The first thing that strikes you about Nautica Voyage is its incredibly fresh and invigorating scent. The fruity top notes of apple are perfectly balanced with the aquatic notes of water lotus, creating a crisp and clean aroma that is both refreshing and uplifting. It's an ideal fragrance for daytime wear, giving you a boost of confidence and energy. Subtle yet romantic: What sets this fragrance apart is its subtle romantic undertone. The heart notes of water lotus and cedarwood add a gentle woody aroma that gives the scent a warm and inviting feel. This combination makes it not only suitable for casual wear but also for more intimate, romantic occasions. Long-lasting and effective: Despite being an Eau de Toilette, Nautica Voyage has impressive longevity. A few sprays in the morning last well into the afternoon, making it a reliable choice for busy days. The scent evolves beautifully over time, starting with the fresh fruity notes and gradually settling into the deeper woody and musky base notes of cedarwood and musk. Versatile and adaptable: This fragrance‚Äôs versatility is one of its strongest points. It‚Äôs light enough for office wear, yet sophisticated enough for a dinner date. Whether you're heading to a meeting, a casual outing, or a romantic evening, Nautica Voyage adapts to the occasion seamlessly. Attractive packaging: The 3.3 fl oz bottle is elegantly designed and looks great on any dresser. The sleek, minimalist design reflects the clean and fresh nature of the scent inside. It‚Äôs also a generous size, providing excellent value for money. Conclusion: Nautica Voyage Eau de Toilette for men is a masterfully crafted fragrance that perfectly balances fresh, fruity notes with warm, woody undertones. Its versatility, longevity, and appealing scent make it a standout choice for any man. Whether for daily wear or special occasions, this fragrance is a winner. Highly recommended for anyone looking to add a touch of freshness and romance to their daily routine.
Classic, clean fragrance purchased for my 16-year-old who collects scents and he wears it regularly. It's not too strong and smells clean and fresh. It's a nice daily wear and great value.

Nautica Voyage EDT: Fresh and Affordable Choice I came across Nautica Voyage EDT while searching for a budget-friendly option. It stands out as a pleasant cologne in its own right. While I‚Äôm not particularly fond of fruity fragrances, Nautica Voyage‚Äôs fruity notes are well-balanced and become subtler after the dry down. I do wish it had a touch more citrus to complement its marine elements better. Citrus scents tend to enhance freshness, which could elevate the overall profile. However, given its price, Nautica Voyage is incredibly economical. It‚Äôs the most affordable cologne per ounce in my collection, making it a practical choice. I‚Äôd give it 4 stars primarily for its value and performance. It‚Äôs perfect for quick errands during warmer months and holds up well throughout the day. My wife appreciates its fresh appeal, although I reserve it for occasions where its fruitiness is less pronounced. Overall, Nautica Voyage EDT is a solid option for those seeking a fresh and budget-friendly fragrance.

Nautica Voyage: Smooth sailing for some, choppy waters for others! Ahoy, fragrance enthusiasts! Nautica Voyage has sailed into my life, and let me tell you, it's been quite the journey. I feel like a dapper sailor every time I spritz it on‚Äîfresh, clean, and ready to conquer the high seas (or at least the grocery store). First whiff? A delightful breeze of apple and green leaves, like a picnic in a coastal orchard. It‚Äôs invigorating and makes me feel like I'm starring in my own yacht commercial. The scent is light, refreshing, and perfect for those who want to smell like they‚Äôve just stepped off a luxury sailboat. But here‚Äôs the thing‚ÄîNautica Voyage isn‚Äôt for everyone. My buddy Dave tried it and said he felt like he was drowning in a sea of cucumbers. My other friend, Jenny, claimed it smelled like someone dumped a fruit salad in her gym bag. To each their own, I suppose! And let‚Äôs talk longevity. It lasts longer than I expected, which is great for me but might not be so great if you‚Äôre stuck in an elevator with someone who isn‚Äôt a fan of oceanic adventures. One coworker commented that I smelled like a wet forest, which I choose to take as a compliment, though I‚Äôm not entirely sure it was. So, if you're ready for a voyage of your own and don‚Äôt mind a few waves of cucumber and apple, Nautica Voyage might just be your new first mate. But fair warning: it‚Äôs smooth sailing for some and choppy waters for others! Anchors away! üö¢

Nautica Voyage: Sailing through life (without the seasickness!) If you‚Äôre on the hunt for a fragrance that screams I‚Äôm ready to sail the seven seas of the office, Nautica Voyage Eau de Toilette is your first mate! Scent adventure: 5/5 This fragrance is like a fruity ocean breeze on a romantic cruise. It‚Äôs so fresh, I think my coworkers are starting to believe I live on a yacht. If only! Affordable luxury: 5/5 For a scent that makes me feel like I could take on Poseidon himself (metaphorically, of course), the price is a steal. Now I can smell like a millionaire without the bank account to match. Versatility: 4/5 Whether I‚Äôm braving a boardroom battle or just battling the snooze button, Nautica Voyage keeps me feeling fresh and confident all day long. It‚Äôs like having a mini vacation in a bottle. Overall: 4.5/5 Nautica Voyage Eau de Toilette is my go-to for smelling like I‚Äôve got the wind in my sails. Affordable, refreshing, and perfect for everyday adventures. Just don‚Äôt be surprised if strangers start asking for sailing tips!

text: Delicious scent and long-lasting fragrance - who doesn't love a Yankee Candle? The Pink Sands scented candle is one of my favorites. Long-lasting - these candles last a long time, giving you plenty of enjoyment before needing a replacement. Versatile usage - lately, I've been using them with candle warmers, and it creates a nice, consistent scent throughout my home. Overall, the Yankee Candle Pink Sands scented candle is a wonderful addition to any home, providing a delightful and lasting fragrance. Highly recommend!

text: Worth every penny! I've been purchasing Yankee Candles for years now. Why? Their scents are strong and don't smell waxy. The candle itself lasts a very long time. You can purchase the cheap 3 for $10 candles at Michaels, but they don't have the strong lasting scent nor do they burn for long. The wax in these doesn't puddle up around the wick, a common problem with some candles. This causes the flame to be extinguished. When the candle burns down too low to light anymore, I use a candle/coffee warmer to continue to enjoy the scent for many more days. I have a supply of these candles on hand at all times and will always buy them.

You won't be disappointed. I recently purchased the Capri Blue Volcano scented candle, and it has quickly become my absolute favorite. From the moment I opened the stylish packaging, I knew I was in for a treat. The scent of this candle is absolutely divine. The volcano fragrance is a perfect blend of tropical fruits, sugared oranges, lemons, and limes, creating a refreshing and uplifting aroma that fills the room without being overpowering. It's the kind of scent that instantly transports you to a tropical paradise, making it ideal for creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere. The burn time of this candle is impressive. Despite its compact size, it burns evenly and lasts for a long time. I appreciate the clean and steady flame, which adds to the overall ambiance. The quality of the wax is excellent, leaving no residue on the glass jar. Speaking of the jar, the design is simple yet elegant. The beautiful blue color complements any decor, and the subtle label adds a touch of sophistication. The lid is a nice touch, helping to preserve the fragrance when the candle is not in use. While the price point may be a bit higher than some other candles on the market, the quality and fragrance of the Capri Blue Volcano scented candle make it well worth the investment. It's a luxurious addition to my home, and I'll definitely be purchasing more in the future. If you're looking for a high-quality candle with an amazing fragrance, look no further than Capri Blue's Volcano candle ‚Äì you won't be disappointed!

Volcano Capri Blue: A Love Story The obvious? It‚Äôs a candle. It smells good. These guys are asking for a review‚Ä¶and I couldn‚Äôt just give the thing five stars and move on. Nope‚Ä¶I‚Äôm required to write an essay?! Of course they want more than a simple stars rating situation. Here it goes‚Ä¶ When I first received the candle‚Ä¶my heart almost beat out of my chest with pure elation. I held back the tears of joy as I tore open the Amazon box. As I ripped into the box‚Ä¶I stopped. I had to take a moment to emotionally prepare myself for the greatness of the new Volcano candle. I had wept for days after burning the last bit of my old Volcano candle. The old container had sat there on my desk‚Ä¶empty‚Ä¶cold‚Ä¶gently citrus scented and devoid of the sweet soft wax that glowed so gently from the jar. ‚ÄúWhy?!?!‚Äù I cried to the sky. ‚ÄúWhy did it have to burn out so soon?!‚Äù I had fallen to the floor‚Ä¶collapsing in sadness and regret, knowing that my last precious moments with the old candle were spent watching Tennessee beat Alabama on the SEC Network. I‚Äôd never forget that precious moment. The light flickered slowly and burned out as the Tennessee Volunteers carried the goal posts down to the Tennessee River. I sat there in my office‚Ä¶watching ESPN‚Ä¶editing audio for Halloween drops on the radio station where I work‚Ä¶melancholy‚Ä¶mourning the loss of my friend‚Ä¶the Capri Blue Volcano candle. In my sadness‚Ä¶I turned to Amazon and ordered a replacement. So‚Ä¶there I was‚Ä¶opening my replacement candle. I slowly removed the box remnants‚Ä¶delicately pulled out my candle lighter‚Ä¶and gently lit the wick. Tears filled my eyes as I pondered my life choices‚Ä¶my meaning in the great vastness of the universe and the ease of ordering a candle‚Ä¶without stepping one foot inside of a brick and mortar store. This is truly what dreams are made of. Thank you‚Ä¶thank you‚Ä¶thank you. It‚Äôs all I‚Äôve ever wanted. My only regret is that I could never repay the joy that this candle has given me. The end.

First one was totally used! The second one is better! Well, I suppose there's a first time for everything. I ordered this candle after some co-workers were raving about the scent but due to the price, I went with the small tin to make sure that I liked it before ordering a larger size. When the candle was delivered, I opened it almost immediately so that I could burn it in my home office. I was a little surprised by the inadequate packing as it was only in a little plastic bag and then, much to my surprise, my candle was already burned to almost nothing! I'm assuming that someone used it and then returned it and there was little/no quality control in place to prevent it from being sent to someone else. I immediately ordered a new one as a replacement and it has arrived. You can see in my picture that I've included the replacement and also the first one that was used. Shaking my head a bit. As for the new candle, I do, in fact, love the scent. It's strong enough to fill my smaller office with a nice fragrance and it comes in the cutest little tin. It does burn a bit fast so I don't think it'll last too long but I will completely enjoy it as long as it lasts. I'm just not particularly happy that I have to go through the hassle of returning the very used product that I originally received within the next couple of weeks or I'll be charged for both. If not for this issue, I would have easily given 4+ stars.

My detailed fair review you can view this review on YouTube just bring up sharee1982. I am an avid lover of candles and I treat and care for them very well. I keep my wicks trimmed properly and I burn them correctly, making sure to liquefy the entire top layer of wax so I do not get memory rings. The first burn is the most important. There are several factors to think about when deciding if a candle will be a great fit for you. The scent is the most important factor for me, and the linger factor is very important too. Secondly, a candle needs to burn evenly. Another very important factor is how long it lasts; I want something that is worth the price tag. I also want a candle that doesn't have that waxy smell or smoky smell. I like a lead-free wick whenever possible. I take all these factors into consideration when I rate a candle. Scent - I find that scent is truly a matter of personal preference and therefore this is the one area that is kind of a matter of personal taste. Some people like fruity scents or floral smells. Some enjoy tropical or food or fruit-related scents and so on and so on. Some people love a strong scented candle, others like something delicate. Where some candles really beat out others is the linger factor; it does not matter if the candle is delicate or strong, it should linger. A good candle's scent will still linger hours after you light it. I feel like some people will rate a candle poorly based on a non-understanding of scent styles and expectations. You cannot expect a delicate scented candle to fill an entire living room; something like that may be good for a relaxing bath or just to scent the bathroom. If you want a candle that can scent a large room, go for a scent style that is strong. With all these things touched upon, here is my review of the Aspen Bay Jar Volcano Candle. This Volcano Candle's scent is delicate yet sensual and it feels invigorating and is unique. I use this as a good bath candle; it creates a spa-like feel when I bathe. If you want something to fill a large living room, this is not that candle unless you burn two at once and place them on different ends of the room. People who smelled this in a store say it's strong, but that is because they burn several of them at once in stores so they really hit you. I find that this candle has a delicate citrus scent and I enjoy it most in a small intimate space. The actual burn - this candle does not burn evenly at all. It does not matter how well you care for it, and trust me I know how to care for candles. It's not the worst, but it does have a layer that just will not burn. The good thing is, it does not have a smoky or waxy smell, and that's a plus, and it does have a long shelf time because it is a large candle and it is a quality candle. My overall wrap-up - I gave this 3 stars because it does last and it is attractive, it does not have a waxy smell, and although I prefer a much stronger scent, it's nice for a bath and the citrus scent is unique. I didn't give 5 stars because it does not burn evenly, and that's a bummer. I hope this review helps. If you have questions, I am happy to answer them. You can view my review of this candle on YouTube sharee1982.

Glad I purchased the mini size and not full size. I have been considering this candle for a while now, and when I found out they had a mini size, I thought it was the perfect time to try it out at a lower cost. I had high hopes, and unfortunately, maybe they were a little too high. The scent itself is okay, but I don't think it's anything unique or something to obsess over. It does smell stronger than a diffuser, plugin, or some other types of products, but it's no stronger than most other candles on the market (lit or unlit). My biggest gripe is that the wick is too short. The wick ended with about 1/3 of the candle still left in the container. I've only seen such short wicks in really cheap candles (I actually just had the same issue with a $5 3-wick candle from Walmart, which ended with about 1/3 of the candle left, too), so it was disappointing that this expensive candle (even if it was mini size) has that issue. I thought the container was cute enough, so I poured boiling water into it and then dumped the rest of the wax (once it was liquid). There was a ton of wax left in there (probably enough to make about two tealight candles). This is probably an okay luxury gift candle to give to someone as a housewarming gift or something, but there are definitely cheaper (and better) options out there. I won't be purchasing the full size due to the risk of the short wick issue and having so much wasted wax.

Great product as advertised. As an aficionado of scented candles, I recently had the pleasure of experiencing the Chesapeake Bay Candle PT31905 scented candle, and I must say, it left an indelible impression. Here's my comprehensive review: Scent: The aroma of this candle is nothing short of enchanting. Its fragrance, described as a blend of calming lavender and refreshing sea salt, transports you to a serene seaside retreat. The lavender notes are soothing and therapeutic, while the subtle hint of sea salt adds a refreshing twist. The balance between the two is impeccable, creating an ambiance that is both relaxing and invigorating. Burn time: One of the standout features of this candle is its impressive burn time. It burns evenly, without tunneling, and lasts for hours on end. Whether I'm unwinding after a long day or setting the mood for a cozy evening in, I can rely on this candle to provide long-lasting enjoyment. Packaging: The packaging of the Chesapeake Bay Candle PT31905 is simple yet elegant. The glass jar exudes a sense of sophistication, while the minimalist label complements the overall aesthetic. It's the kind of candle you'd proudly display in any room of your home or office. Wax quality: I appreciate that this candle is crafted from high-quality, eco-friendly soy wax. Not only does soy wax burn cleaner and longer than traditional paraffin wax, but it's also a sustainable choice. Knowing that I'm supporting environmentally conscious practices only enhances my enjoyment of this candle. Price: While the Chesapeake Bay Candle PT31905 is priced slightly higher than some alternatives, its exceptional quality justifies the cost. In my opinion, the superior fragrance, burn time, and eco-friendly ingredients make it a worthwhile investment.

Pretty but disappointing. I was really excited for this candle. I've been experimenting with candles lately and wanted this to be the candle I burn while working from home. It arrived last night and as soon as I opened it this morning and gave it a whiff, my first thought was, this smells like bug spray! I briefly thought about returning it, but I was so looking forward to a candle touted as awaken + invigorate that I still wanted to at least give it a chance. So I went ahead and lit it and have had it going for a while... still not great! The candle looks really nice and the smell isn't super offensive (kinda subtle actually), but it's just not pleasant for anyone who knows what roach spray smells like... I guess we can blame Raid for that. And like another reviewer said (wish I read that before I bought this), I smell no eucalyptus at all. It's so disappointing, but I guess that's the risk you take buying candles online rather than getting them in person so you can smell them first. I'm still going to give it a chance for the day and see if it grows on me or something, but I have low expectations at this point. And I surely won't be lighting it if I know anyone's coming over anytime soon for fear that they think I have a roach problem.

I had to scoop out like 20% of the candle to get it to even keep burning, and put foil over it, leaning in to heat the wax evenly enough to melt to one level. I lit it again - and it just started tunneling again immediately - so I can only burn it with aluminum foil wrapped around it and leaning over the top. Not exactly the best decor look. Thankfully, I have multiple wax melters, so the extra wax didn't go to waste - but I would never buy this brand again.

It lasted five minutes before burning out. I was so looking forward to this candle because it has such great reviews. I‚Äôm just looking for something that I didn‚Äôt have to keep lit and let the scent roam. Unfortunately, this was not that candle. After lighting it once, it burned out in five minutes. I lit it again hoping it was just a snag, and after another five minutes, it burned out. I tried again, and the third time it lasted about 10 minutes. It kept making a deeper and deeper hole for itself as the wax filled up, and now I can‚Äôt even light it anymore because the wick is completely under wax. I had this candle less than an hour. As for the scent, I barely smell anything. I will be exchanging this immediately. I believe a lot of these reviews are fake, but I will give the manufacturer the benefit of the doubt and say this was a flop candle. I‚Äôll let them send me one more, and I‚Äôll keep you posted with my honest review. Okay, here‚Äôs my second review. It‚Äôs been two days since I got the new candle, and it burns beautifully. There‚Äôs no hole, it doesn‚Äôt burn out every five minutes. In fact, I lit it once, and it stayed lit, and the smell is perfect. So, beware if you get a busted candle. It could happen. Just return it for a brand new one. You won‚Äôt be disappointed the second time, hopefully, because I‚Äôm very happy with this product now.

too small for vase didn‚Äôt fit my vase

One of my absolute favorite scents! These candles are my absolute favorite. The pear and water lily blend is not too fragrant for me, I am super sensitive to smells that trigger my migraines so I have to be careful of what I use and these candles are just fine for me. (I would say maybe 2/3 times a week for about 3-4 hours of use) I also added a second picture with a remote and an Xbox controller for size comparison. Great candle, but arrived melted. I would have been very pleased with the balance + harmony candle itself. The scent is uniquely pleasant and relaxing, and the wood-topped, colored glass container is lovely. It came packaged securely in a nice cardboard box; however, the candle wax had melted in transit and the scented oil used leaked through the packaging. Sadly, this made the candle ungiftable, which was my original intention. I highly recommend the candle, just don't order it during the summer months if you live in a warmer climate.

Nice candle! This candle has a really excellent fragrance. My daughter was burning this, and I immediately went home and found it on Amazon. I was into the three-wick candles for a while, but I'm back on single wick. They burn slower, smoke less, and unlike the trendy store three-wick candles, the single wick burns the wax all the way down to the bottom.

This brand has the best candles. The throw of these candles is amazing. I can smell the candle throughout my whole house. I would recommend this scent 100%. It‚Äôs a sweet scent but not too sweet that makes you have a headache.

Disappointed I have had this candle before and loved it so much I got it again. This time it's burning really poorly. This picture is a few hours of burning and only this small circle is burnt because the wick is too small. Not sure what happened but this one was a miss. Hopefully it will adjust as it burns more.
Nice strong scent for those who love lavender. Looks good too. Lovely lid comes with it.

not burning or smelling good. i loved these candles. the smell was amazing. i love the color, shape/ all of it. i had purchased several of these candles with no issues. i bought the large one for my mother-in-law for Christmas and a smaller one for me, which I opened 2 days ago. look at the flame/ going straight down. it also had a very weak to nonexistent smell. you can see by the 2nd photo that the wax isn‚Äôt evenly distributed. i don‚Äôt know what happened when they were making these. but since I can‚Äôt return it, I‚Äôm stuck with it. it‚Äôs a shame since I truly admired the smell and how long this candle lasted. I really don‚Äôt want to give a bad review, but Chesapeake Bay, please look at this candle.

Normally I love these candles. I normally love these candles; they all have a great scent that lasts forever. But for some reason, this candle barely has any scent at all, and the wax does not melt on a candle warmer, which is just bizarre. I had it on all day, and it barely got the candle half warm, and the warmer itself works fine (I tried it on another candle, and it worked great). Not sure if something is wrong with the wax or what, but I'm so disappointed that it won't melt. I really didn't want to actually light it and burn it, but I think I'm going to have to.

smells strong if you love the smell of lavender this is it. bought as a gift to a book friend excited to gift it great size great smell.

wonderful scent the person loved it.

smells great! no weird scent. I am a migraine queen. Certain scents cause instant migraines due to whatever is used to scent the candle. This one does not contain problem oils. (I haven't nailed down said problems, and I never know from just smelling the unlit candle. It is after the candle is lit that the migraine kicks in.) No migraine from this one. The scent is delicate but long-lasting. It scents the room nicely, and the scent lingers even after the candle is extinguished. The candle is a good one that doesn't melt away to nothing in an hour, leaving the buyer wondering why they paid so much for a cheap thrill. I gifted one to a co-worker who gives it high marks, good praise indeed. This person is hard to please and sets a very high bar. If she had not been as pleased with the candle, she would have told me not to waste my money on them again.

Unfortunately, lost its scent after first use. The product was well packaged and arrived in great condition. The candle jar itself is pretty and adds a relaxing spa look. Before purchasing, I noticed some of the reviews mentioned the candle's lack of scent, but took a chance. It had a scent the first time I used it and that's it. It has now become a scent-free candle! I would have been better off buying a Glade air freshener candle at a lower price. For me, it's now useless because I wanted a relaxing scent. I'm throwing it out.
Smells so good, burns well. I have bought this same candle several times. I love the smell so much. Even my husband and son like the scent. Well made, nice glass jar. Will continue to buy.
Nice candle but! Horrible packing! Who would send a glass candle in a padded bag? Lucky it didn't shatter.

Perfect for the 'powder room' & I mean that in a good way for a reason... I chose this company because its name: Chesapeake Bay Candles. The name brought back some good childhood memories of growing up as a U.S. Army brat in Maryland and around the Chesapeake Bay. Patronizing the shops and homemade goods. Simpler, somewhat soothing, relaxing times. Anyways, this candle has a slow burn & a light to medium 'throw'. But I must admit, I didn't get a hint of jasmine or cashmere. Unless cashmere and jasmine are supposed to smell like lightly scented hand soap, bleach and fresh fern & a hint of honeysuckle/ moss-covered waterfalls in a national park. Which it isn't supposed to. And mind you, I was burning this in my living room. Not the bathroom & no bleach anywhere. In fact, I'm fresh out. Go figure. It's all in the nose of the beholder. Lol who knows? You might actually smell the jasmine or cashmere... or something else completely different. Hopefully pleasing to your olfactory senses. But it's a win all the same and functions perfectly in the loo. The fragrance is perfect without being too heady. No heinous powdery or perfumed or even 'fabric softener type' scents that are popular; the latter I sometimes grab like every other person out there. Also, no high flame or flare-up. Nevertheless, you should still keep a close eye on any candle. Because it has such a light but clean & fresh smell, this candle functions best in a small space: restroom, den, an office space, a guest room. You get the idea. It is a tranquil aroma that's a gentler way to start your day with your morning shower. I look forward to testing out Chesapeake Bay Candle's other goods.
Smells great, lasts long, great gift.

Wonderful scent. I love this candle. I've purchased them many times from Target but came on here to buy more. I don't get why mine won't stay lit, never had that problem before. Either way, the scent is great, not overpowering. I got the medium-ish size and we use it in our spare bathroom.

And I have no regrets).
lovely fragrance. While the fragrance isn‚Äôt overpowering, it is strong enough to be a subtle background.

smells amazing, but doesn't last long. I love the scent of this candle; however, I have bought 3 and they burn through fast. I wish this company would make a longer-lasting candle. I haven't bought any more only for this reason. I need a candle to last more than a couple of days.

Great soy candles! I love candles, but wax candles are very bad for pets. I found these soy candles on Amazon, and they are just beautiful. They burn a long time and burn evenly. The scent is heavenly, and they give the house a nice fragrant scent.
Great choice, this candle has a really fresh smell to it.

Chesapeake Bay Candle scented candle, Stillness + Purity (Rose Water), Large. I have bought several Chesapeake Bay Candle scented candles, this time in a variety of scents. This time I got Stillness + Purity (Rose Water), Large and was really not impressed by its scent. It was an off smell of rose, not relaxing at all. I like all the other scents by this same brand I have tried. This one just smelled like fake sort of rose with a huge linger of powder or something, which did not blend well at all with rose. It smells, not to be rude, but like a cheap, overpowering, powdery perfume someone really old would wear. I would return it, but I tried it and lit it, and now it's junk - I cannot stand it another moment. I do recommend other scents, including Thyme Lavender, Lily Pear, or even tobacco-scented versions of Chesapeake Bay soy candles (they are long-lasting, burn clean, and look quite good overall). They all didn't disappoint, but this one was a huge miss for me. I would skip the rose.
Lovely scent, great scent, and burns nicely.

White Barn - Champagne Toast Candle (made with essential oils). The candle was nicely packaged to protect it from breaking. When I took the candle out of its packaging and removed the candle's cover/cap, the wonderful scent of the candle overwhelmed me in a good way! The scent of the candle is absolutely divine! On the candle itself, the scent is described as bubbly champagne, bright berries, and juicy tangerine. I don't know if I would say that champagne has a scent, but I would definitely say this candle smells like berries and tangerines. I purchased this as a gift for someone, so I hope that its scent is just as potent and delightful when it's burning as it is now.

Homemade I received my candle separated from the jar and with marks on the bottom of the container. I'm not sure if Amazon shipping or the vendor is to blame for the separation of wax from the jar. The scent is nice but it doesn't feel professionally produced.
Best scent if you like fruity, long-lasting scents and very relaxing if you are a fan of soft citrus fruit.

So very happy I was so very happy with this product. Even the Amazon guy that dropped off the product treated this product like gold. It‚Äôs even better than the site to actually buy it from. Smells so good.

Smells like grapefruit large candle with solid glass vessel and metal top w/ rubber ring. Smells more like grapefruit or ros√© than champagne. Vessel is a translucent pink so it emits a pinkish glow throughout the room.

Great purchase! White Barn is my favorite thus far. The scent is very strong. Smells great in the entire house. This scent was very lovely. Even though these are rather pricey, I'd rather pay the money and be satisfied with the purchase.
Beautiful gift! Purchased as a gift, then reordered one for myself. Nice scent, long burn, and beautiful candle.

Do not order, received one wick used candle. No help available, I only received one candle. It had one wick and was used! The candle is 3/4 used. Do not order these. And you can't get any help.
Awesome scent!!! The smell is absolutely awesome. I'm very pleased with my candle. By far, it's the best scented candle I own, and I refuse to let anyone borrow it or buy it from me. I ain't sharing.

Heaven in a jar, this scent is absolutely amazing. It's subtle yet lasting smell takes up the whole room! Would recommend 10x.
Christmas gift. It was a gift.
Best scent ever! This is my favorite scent by far! Two of these will make your whole house smell incredible!
Good light scent. Great buy, for yourself or someone you love! I love the scent of this candle!! Great gift for a loved one, or friend.
soothing scent. great scent. simple and fresh.

Great value for money where other companies would charge almost double for a similar product.

Intoxicating! My partner of over 20 years has an amazing natural scent. This smells like an exaggerated version of him. A candle can‚Äôt replace him, but it can pacify me when he‚Äôs not here. I rarely review anything and never a candle, so take this as a genuine endorsement! Tempted to try some of the other ones... Wait! Am I still talking about candles?! LOL.
Very deluxe candle, very strong pleasant fragrance. Reminds me of the opium candle from way back, but much better quality and price point!

smells a lot like incense. While the overall this smell is clean, the oud(?) part must have incense because with jasmine and sandalwood I didn‚Äôt expect an incense smell. But it does have a lot of good scent so I would recommend it if you don‚Äôt mind the smell of incense.
smells sooooo yummy. I love this smell so much. The wick burnt out and there was still about an inch left of wax, so I put it in the oven to get the smells lol. I really like the scent!

Espresso bean: overkill artificial scent. I really wanted to like the espresso bean scent as I love coffee-scented candles. Unfortunately, this one smelled very artificial and strong. The scent was a little too much and got me nauseous after a while. It reminded me of super sugary cheap coffee, lol. That being said, my boyfriend, who isn't super picky on scented candles, expressed how he liked the scent.

Classy Candle: The Vanilla Bean is a subtle, lovely, authentic scent. I don't know how long it will last since I've had it for such a short time, but I let it burn the first time for about 30 minutes, and it was down about 1/4 inch. This is my second Lulu candle. My first was an ocean-breeze scent, also very nice, and it was the smaller size. It came with a very nice lid, but this larger one came without a lid. The labels can be removed easily to give a clean look. This jar is black glass, while the first smaller one was clear. The clear looks messier once the candle starts to melt down. The candle comes in a very sturdy square box that tells what's inside, but it would still be beautiful wrapped as a gift.

Smells good! The scents I‚Äôve purchased are sandalwood, vanilla coconut, and mango. My favorite that's not too overpowering and leaves a light, pleasant scent so far is the vanilla coconut. I want to try another scent, but I'm so happy with the vanilla coconut! Follow-up! I‚Äôm obsessed with the blood orange & grapefruit. My daughter took my island coconut, so I ordered another one.
Great candle smells like an ocean mist.

product_variation: Scent: Jasmine, Oud & Sandalwood|Size: 6 Oz. 2 Pack
text: Best candles! Safe ingredients ‚ù§Ô∏è This is my 3rd purchase of these candles! I absolutely love them! I used to buy the Bath & Body Works candles because they truly smell incredible, but they were not only overpriced but also super toxic for our health, hormones, and well-being in general. So, I did my research about most of the candles out there, and even the ones that seem to be less harmful still are. I came across these candles from a TikTok girl that recommended them, and when they arrived, they already smelled from the package! I only have to light them up for a few minutes, and our whole living room smells amazing! I also put another one in our room, and it smells amazing in just 1 minute! Definitely purchasing more!!!!
Smells great so far so good! Burns pretty evenly, smells good and looks as pictured.

Love these candles! I went to a trendy new restaurant and one of these candles was burning in the bathroom. I loved the smell so I looked them up and purchased their best seller. I'm pretty sure that wasn't the scent the restaurant was using, but I loved it. It's a white floral with the weight of oud and a touch of high-class powder. I can see how others think it's a bit dated, but I think it smells wonderful. So strong and lasts and lasts. I've burned through most of the jasmine oud one and then decided to try a different smell for the second candle. My best friend had some sandalwood rose lotion when we were younger, and I was expecting something similar. It's vaguely like that lotion, but this is a more realistic rose. My boyfriend wasn't a fan because he doesn't like roses. The jasmine one was stronger, but this one is a nice change of pace. The sandalwood is there and gives it a modern spin. I'll burn it when he's not at my apt. I also love that these are soy wax candles with a cotton wick. I don't feel like I'm inhaling petro products.

Smells divine! I went to an appointment last week and they were burning this candle in the office, and I could not get over how good it smelled. Before I left, I had to get the brand of the candle, so I took a picture and as soon as I got home, ordered it on Amazon. Ever since, it has continued to fill my house with this unbelievably pleasant and divine fragrance.
Smells nice. It's kinda pricey for the amount of time it lasted. It did smell the room up with a nice fragrance.

text: It's a good masculine scent! I like it! Nice throw.

most manly smelling candle ever.! this candles elevated every room to a higher level of masculinity and freshness. makes the man feel good about himself and the aroma of his room.

Nice scent. Generously protected in transit, I am enjoying this candle. Nice scent. Pleasing sturdy candle holder. I was happy to see how someone carefully wrapped it so it would survive the trip through the mail. Quality product. Secure packaging.

smells good, but definitely not like santal 26. I bought this candle looking for a Le Labo Santal 26 dupe. Upon arrival, it was packaged really well and had the aesthetic of Le Labo products. The candle is a really good option as a gift since it basically only needs to be wrapped to be a giftable item. The candle itself, however, smells nothing like Santal. I own Santal 33 and know Santal 26 very well, and this candle has basically no resemblance to either. Now don't get me wrong, this candle smells pretty good and is very strong, which is great for me because my roommate has a very heavy ethnic smell and this covers it up very well for when guests come over. The smell of the candle does have some sandalwood scent and it is pleasing, but just isn't Santal 26 or 33. If you want the Santal 26 candle smell, I recommend you just buy the candle or its room spray equivalent which is $100 on the website for 100ml.

text: My favorite candle. Preference of fragrance is unique to the individual. Though many people love food-related smells like cakes, vanilla, or fruity notes, I prefer notes of sandalwood, patchouli, or other woodland smells. These Lulu candles smell so good and they hold their smell all the way to the bottom of the container. Also, they last much longer than the less expensive brands. Highly recommend.

Sensitive to smells. I'm hypersensitive to smells and in particular not a fan of jasmine. This candle is light-smelling, long-lasting, and though perfumey, it's not chemically. The smell is good and neutral. Giving it a 4 because I'm not a big fan of the smell, but it is a good smell. Going to use it until it runs out.

presents simple yet elegant. have not used yet, but it has a great aroma through the box. may give as a gift! (or keep it) üòâ will look great on a small table outside, at a picnic or on a railing on the porch. easy to use with a screw top if you want to put it out to use later.

A captivating scent I've ordered this candle several times and keep coming back for more! The scent is wonderful and strong enough to permeate my entire living room. I use it every day to add an olfactory element to my daily meditation time and also when I sit down to play the piano. It's truly the best scented candle I've ever experienced.

Overpowering scent! I was excited to try the Lulu Jasmine, Oud & Sandalwood candle as so many reviews were positive. The black glass has an elegant, lovely presentation. I am replacing my current candles with non-toxic, clean-burning soy wax, so I really wanted to like this candle. But wow... scent is way too strong! It's overpowering and headache-inducing. Maybe it's the particular scent I selected, but definitely a disappointment. Unfortunately, after three attempts, I will be discarding this candle. I prefer a subtle, less-is-more fragrance. Update 2/9/2024: I was advised by Lulu Candle Company that there are scents with a softer scent throw. I took a chance and ordered the Tobacco Spice and Vanilla - and I'm enjoying it. Less overpowering and invokes a nostalgic warm and cozy vibe.

I've bought five of these in two months. I've purchased more than five of these in two months: five palo santos, a lavender one, and the rose sandalwood. The appearance is elegant and chic, perfect for gifting. The throw is amazing, even when unlit, and the actual scents are sublime. Highly recommend, which is why 3 of those palo santos are gifts for others.

My absolute favorite fragrance. These candles burn with the same fragrance level for long periods. Many candles don't smell the same when burned for a couple of hours. The black jar makes them look so classy. Love this candle!

text: A little smaller than I expected but amazing strong scent. The smell of the mahogany teak is amazing. I highly suggest this if you're a guy looking for a cologne-like smell. Very clean, woody, leather smell.

Worth it! I've been slowly trying to replace all of my big brand toxic candles around the house with better options. Did you know that candles that contain artificial colors, synthetic wicks, and paraffin wax or blended wax are actually carcinogenic? Not for me. Lulu Candles checks all the boxes for a clean candle so I don‚Äôt have to give up the cozy warmth when I have company or just simply want some relaxing ambiance all to myself. My personal favorites so far are tobacco spice and vanilla - which has a smoky richness cut with sweet notes, and sandalwood rose - the woodsy depth of sandalwood with just enough floral not to be overpowering or too powdery. I can‚Äôt wait to try out a few more; all of the sizes are simple and aesthetically pleasing with a neutral boutique apothecary vibe. And yes, they are a bit pricey compared to other 100% soy candles available, but the scent selection is much wider with Lulu Candles. I personally have not had any problems with weakness of scent or wax tunneling as other consumers mentioned. My only critique would be that I wish the 9oz came with a lid - but I‚Äôve just been putting them back in the paper box they are shipped in when I switch them out.
Love the scent when I'm in the mood for a heady, sensual scent. It was exceptionally well packaged so that the glass did not break.

Loved the pineapple evergreen! However, the one everyone seems to love the oud jasmine and sandalwood smells like stale old people perfume lol I can‚Äôt even burn it. But the pineapple evergreen I‚Äôm buying again I loved it and it lasts so long!

My new favorite scent ever! Okay, this candle smells incredible! Even when it isn't lit, I will smell it in my room and I love it! As far as the scent goes, the smell reminds me of the garage in Harvard Square... I know that won't mean anything to most of you, but if you know, you know! I'd say it's kind of slightly like nag champa incense, with patchouli and cedarwood, but more sophisticated, in a luxury hotel scent kind of way?!? I have no clue how to explain scents, but it smells really good! Also, I have no clue what oud is, but I think I love it... I also went on the company's website and bought everything with this scent, like reed diffusers, a rollerball perfume, a body lotion, and a bigger candle! I would like to try other scents from them, but I need to live in this amazing smell for a while! Okay, hope this helps!

text: warm, classy, scent. i love this candle. originally i night 5 or 6 scents and while all of them were nice the jasmine, oud, and sandalwood are the ones i've bought several times now. it's a beautiful, classy, scent that covers rooms. the candles burn well and leave a warm feeling. i will buy these again and i will continue to try other scents because there is a very nice quality to everything i've tried so far.

highly scented, long lasting! The media could not be loaded. I originally bought these candles because my husband loves to cook and his cooking stinks up our house. He's such a love bug, but that doesn't mean our home has to smell like garlic and feet. Bless his heart. All of the candles I've purchased from other brands last a few days and emit a faint aroma of scent, barely noticeable. So, I tried this one. Not expecting much, I was really surprised that within an hour, my whole house (1700 sq ft) smelled so nice, but not overpowered by fragrance. I was all, nice. A few hours later, at bedtime, I went to blow out the candle and noticed the wax had barely melted down, like barely at all. Normally, after several hours of burning scented candles, there would be a pool of melted wax floating in the candle. Not this candle. The wax lasts so long, there was hardly a divot in the candle, like it had just been lit. This candle is worth every single penny. You'll wind up actually saving money, not needing to buy many candles, just to make your home smell nice. New, longtime customer here!

Edited to clarify: wick burns faster than the candle, so you have to drain off the wax to get to the wick.
