I only get about a half of a workday before I hear the friendly female voice say battery low, and I'm forced to put the right one back in the charging case and switch to the left, which is not preferable as I use my left ear to answer the work phone. My only other negative is that you can't use the find my feature if they're in the case. The other evening as I was emptying my pockets to go to bed, I noticed they were missing. It turns out they fell out of my pocket while at home watching TV, and it took me a while to find them. It would've been nice to be able to find them quicker. On the positive side though, I love the ambient aware feature so I can really have conversations without taking them out. They are comfortable and stay in my ears even on my 7-mile bike ride home after work. The sound quality for videos and music is great, no complaints there. When these die or I lose them, I'll definitely stay with JBL, either these again or I'll see if there's one with a little better battery life. Overall, you can't beat the price for what you get.

Way better than AirPods. I‚Äôve had a couple of different generations of AirPods as well as numerous other brands of wireless earbuds (including JBL Tune, which I wasn‚Äôt a huge fan of). I was looking into getting the AirPods Pro again, but decided I just didn‚Äôt want to spend that much money. After some research, I ended up choosing JBL Vibe Beam and felt fairly comfortable with my decision because I am a fan of JBL. I do not regret it at all. They are better than AirPods by far - piece of advice, get the ‚ÄúJBL Headphones‚Äù app. The earbuds automatically come on the jazz setting so I could see how someone wouldn‚Äôt be satisfied. You can change the equalizer (I used one of the top picture reviews and copied how they had theirs, but they also have other presets). I listen to a lot of rap, metal, alternative, etc., so bass is a huge thing for me and using the equalizer was a game-changer. The sound is so clear and the bass is amazing. This is probably the most satisfied I‚Äôve ever been with an earbud purchase. It‚Äôs also super easy to connect them. The name showed up right away so the total process maybe took 10-15 seconds to pair them for the first time, which is pretty rare. I‚Äôve had some issues with other earbuds in the past (spending up to 5 minutes trying to pair them).

Quality product, fair price. I have been happy with these after 2-3 months of putting them through the gamut. They fit snug and comfortable, and I haven‚Äôt experienced any wiggle when running or mowing. They charge quickly, and the light changes colors from orange to green when fully charged, so no guesswork is nice. The tap-to-pause feature is great so you don‚Äôt have to pull a bud out when you need a quick chat or listen. Paired instantly with my Apple phone and does the job for substantially cheaper than competing products.

Great quality and sound, these are by far the best earbuds I've ever had! They stay charged for about 8 and a half hours before I have to recharge them in the buds. An added bonus, they come with different size fittings for the earpiece. There's an app that goes with them to adjust the settings like bass and treble. Love the color too, had to replace them because I lost the pod at work so this is my second time owning them, just the first time they were black. Definitely recommend getting these!

Better than AirPods, I know, I know, I did not believe it either when I first bought it. These headphones are worth every dollar because they truly do bring out the best quality for its price range. After using them for a full day, I noticed I got better feedback wearing the JBL's than I did with the AirPods. Will be buying these again, for sure!

Daughter loves these headphones! I got these to replace a pair of broken headphones my daughter had. She absolutely loves the sound of these and the battery lasts all day pretty much. They stay connected and in her ear with no pain, which says a lot because she usually has ear pain with inner ear headphones. I got them on a deal so the price was perfect. 10/10 definitely recommend!

I really like them! For pretty cheap, I think these are a good pair of headphones! They aren't soundproof, that's for sure - but I really don't mind because I like being able to hear a bit of noise around me! For the price, I think they work well and are easy to use - the only thing is they can sometimes become uncomfortable in the ear after long periods of wearing.

Good buds for the price - some cons for the sound on the earbuds, I would rate it as a 3.5. I would rate the battery life as a 4. I give the buds a little lower rating because, as a lot of other earbuds, the controls on the earbuds themselves are hit and miss and not reliable to do what you want to do, and the sound could be a little better. I am trying to be critical of them, so people have a better idea, and to me a five would mean there is no way to improve them. These really are pretty good earbuds.

Not bad for the price. I‚Äôve had four brand tumors so I don‚Äôt like holding a cell phone next to my head, that‚Äôs my thing. But anyway, I use Bluetooth earbuds and headphones, JBL for the good quality. The sound quality is not as high as I would prefer, but again for the price, they‚Äôre really good. The battery life is even better. I also washed them in the washing machine, but I caught them before the dryer, and they still work just as good.

Very durable, use these for farming every day. The other day, I lost them in the case and found them the next day on the dirt road. After being driven over multiple times with tractors and semis, they still charge and still have a nice crisp sound. The case doesn‚Äôt close all the way anymore, but the buds and case still charge and work.
Good! The product is nice, but I put 4 stars because I think that sometimes I need to turn up too much the volume, because I don‚Äôt almost listen it.

Keeps a charge. These headphones were a present for my husband. He likes that the charge lasts a long time and charges quickly. The sound quality is great. He has used them when answering phone calls and he can hear everything clearly.

Wouldn‚Äôt get again. One headphone will connect with my phone while still in the case, causing the other headphone to not work well if not next to the other. Even when they are both in the case, it will connect to my phone and I have no way of shutting it off, so the battery just drains. I bought these before and had them for a long time before needing to replace. Disappointed in this pair!

washer and dryer proof these headphones are the goat. i always need a soft squishy earbud for my ears so these are comfortable. not only are they 90% noise cancelling, the charge lasts at least 3 days. the best thing is i thought i lost them. turns out after the fourth of july weekend they were in my pants pocket and i put them straight into the wash and then subsequently the dryer. to my utter shock and giorno i thought they were toast, i flipped open the lid and the little green light stayed on so i tested them out. immediately connected to my phone no problem and also nothing has been affected sound wise. talk about durability. i knew i loved my speak but i will now exclusively be purchasing from jbl.

Great headphones. Great sound quality, high bass, and a variety of settings to control your sound preference. Today I accidentally put my earbuds through both a wash and dry cycle. They came out perfectly fine, just a bit warm. Great quality.

Excellent performance! But not fitting for my oddly shaped ears. These work great! I have long trusted the JBL brand for reliability and performance. I really wanted these to work for me; however, I have goofy tiny ears and tried both medium and small silicone tips. No matter what, both sides took turns getting loose or just falling out with very limited movement. Many of my instinctive touches to push back in triggered an unintended ‚Äútap‚Äù feature causing hang up or off. Bummed to return but realistically never going to function for me.
They sound great. Pro: These earbuds sound great and are comfortable. Con: They are hard to get out of their storage can't really have a good grip on them.
Don‚Äôt sound bad. Not bad for what they are. I had to get these 'cause the Bose earbuds are very touch-sensitive. The straps from my bike helmet will trigger them.

Great buy! These are without a doubt the best earbuds I have ever owned. The sound quality is phenomenal. The amount of bass is unbelievable. And the fact that you can use the app, which has an equalizer you can adjust yourself. Also, if you lose them, the app can show you where to look. All around great buy.
Works well for the price, decent battery life, fits nice and snug, can't fast charge and biggest thing but won't grind on it too much for the price, zero to no bass.

Loved my husband loved these I have AirPods and these work just as good as mine! And very comfortable only thing is they fall out kind of easy but besides that they‚Äôre lightweight and the features on the app are so handy.

bass bass bass :) this is what i set my headphones and Spotify to and it‚Äôs even better bass than my AirPods Pro I had before, I do have really small ears and I put the smallest size on and my right earbud sometimes falls out but they aren‚Äôt uncomfortable overall great product and especially for the price!
Nice earpiece, it works great. Only thing is, if you are in a crowded space with activities, the person on the line won't hear you very well.

So far so good, these work like any other headphones I've had. The sound is okay, not as much bass as I had hoped for. The charge seems to last a while and is adequate. My biggest problem with these is that they are hard to get out of the case; my fingers are too fat to grab the tops of the earbuds.

Equivalent to Apple AirPods but more affordable. Love the color, I got matte black and it‚Äôs more aesthetic than gloss white in my opinion. I searched for various AirPods dupes and these have been the best so far for a fraction of the price. I would recommend 10/10 if you‚Äôre looking for something with good sound and cheap!

Decent for the price, hard to pair with some devices. For the price, the sound quality is great. You can also modify/control sound quality like bass/treble/and how much ambient noise you hear with the JBL app which is neat. Pairing it with my laptop sometimes doesn‚Äôt work unless I restart my laptop. Don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs my laptop‚Äôs fault since it pairs smoothly with other devices. No issues pairing it with my phone and desktop though. Pretty solid for the price.
Remove yellow tape from buds. Make sure you remove protective shipping tape or the earbuds will not work. The directions do not illustrate this. I called JBL tech service and they were very helpful.

Great bass sound! I like the sound quality. But they need, at least for my ears, a smaller set of earpieces. They sometimes fall out at the most inconvenient times, like if I'm leaning over a bucket of paint!

Great earbuds, they are very durable and sturdy. The value for the money for these earbuds is phenomenal, I use them every day and have had no issues. They hold a charge very well. With the interchangeable earbud tips, you can find the ones that suit you the best, they are very comfortable.

Great quality! I was always afraid I would not be able to talk while working, and this is the best choice I've ever made. I can talk and do my things, and people can actually hear me. Great battery, charges fast, great sound. You should get it.

Durability I absolutely love these earbuds, they are some of the best I have ever had! I have had them a little over a year and they still work as if I had just bought them!! I will not lie I have dropped them a lot whether they were in the case or not and they still don't disappoint!!! I would totally buy!!! And they are super affordable üòç
Difficulty to unplug the cable from the charging case. It is difficult to unplug the cable from the charging case.

Perfect earbuds! These earbuds are perfect. They work great. They charge right up, and the sound is pretty darn good. They came with some extra plugs as accessories but left out the small plugs which I can really use. So if the vendor can send me the small ear plugs, that would be great. I strongly recommend this brand and these earbuds. I use them when I am mowing the lawn. They are perfect for me!
Very nice earbuds I bought one first and enjoyed it so I had to get 6 more as a gift. For this price it‚Äôs a steal! Battery lasts enough and looks very fancy.
Well above expectations! Being a construction guy, I need the features on the app that are suggested in the quick start guide. I'm very impressed with everything about these headphones!

They're good earbuds. They sound great and have good distance. The only problem I have with them is keeping them in my ears. They have fallen out a few times. But, still the best earbuds I have ever owned. Great deal for the money.
Not easily removed from case, it's tough to get out from the case. Other than that, they are decent for the price.

Better than expected! Bought these to listen to music on my phone. Was surprised at the clarity coming through these small wireless earbuds. They're comfortable and I love that they charge from their small pocket-size carrying case. Love them!

Great fit and audio, my favorite Bluetooth I've used in a long time. Update: still like these, one downfall - can't be paired to two devices at the same time. They fit really well. I have small ears and these are comfortable. I have other ones by this brand which is not the case. The audio is good. I use them during video conference calls for work and during the day listening to music. Initially, I had trouble pairing them, now they pair very easily but I think that was user error on my part. Only mentioned it because don't give up if you have that same problem... and no, I didn't read the directions lol. They stay put, which is nice. Again, the other two pairs I have from the same brand do not. If you can't tell already, I would highly recommend these. The only thing I don't like about this Bluetooth is the color because I don't like those white things sticking out of my ears. Personal.

Pretty good deal! I have a little bit of a hard time keeping them in, especially once I‚Äôm sweaty while running, but they are great for being still or taking calls. Could just be the way my ears are, but they don‚Äôt stay put very well while exercising. Fast charging and easy setup.
Great value! They fit me perfectly, I even run with them. Very good for the price!! Would recommend this brand. I also have the same brand wireless headphones üëç.
Great product, I like it. It's nice, comfortable in the ear... love the case, it's lightweight and not heavy. JBL always stands out and I love their brands and products. This is one of them.

Nice quality audio. Okay, so they are not as bass-heavy as they make them sound, and they are not very loud. As far as sound quality, they are good, and the app allows you to adjust features and locate lost headphones.
I love how I use these to talk hands-free while driving, and I can listen to my books in my classroom while on break.
Very good product, very durable, battery life is not long, but if you charge daily would be able to use the whole day, easy to install.
Wonderful! These are very comfortable, and they sound great! I like to wear them hiking and they stay in my ears well :)
Great earphones. I am enjoying the earphones, great for the price.

Very impressed for the price. I went through a couple of pairs of AirPods Pro and they kept getting beat up on the job site, so I decided to try a cheap pair. Very impressed for being a fifth of the price. Even has some features that pros didn‚Äôt have, like turning up bass through the app. Definitely recommend.
These sound great, the earbuds sound great, and the app works well with them. The only thing I dislike about them is the stem on the bud makes it a little difficult to take out of the case.
Good for the price, seems to work well after having for 1 month. Had to adjust bass using JBL app, Amazon Music app, and a couple of other music apps. There was no bass when I first set them up.
Great sound. I was pleasantly surprised how good the sound was from these buds. Great value for the price. I'm gonna get my wife a set too. Excellent quality!

Quality, great sound, great battery life! Really enjoyed this product, it honestly has better sound quality than my AirPods, and are more than half the price! I highly recommend for working out, daily listening, and great battery life!
Great works great as an earphone for music. Thought it was a noise-canceling one, however. Picked up background noise too easily.
JBL A+ battery lasts long. Great sound, only downfall when you get a call you have to put it on JBL on your phone even if you answer by tapping earbuds.
Sounds great, small and compact, but has a nice bass. Easy to set up, easy to use. I like them.

Affordable quality earbuds. I bought these for my ten-year-old son, who wanted his first pair of wireless earbuds but doesn‚Äôt have the greatest track record of keeping track of small items. I figured for this price it wouldn‚Äôt be an enormous hit if they got lost or weren‚Äôt the best audio quality. Shame on me for judging based on price, because these are amazing quality and perfect for what I wanted out of them. They hold a great charge, charge quickly, and sound amazing. They‚Äôre easy to pair to any phone and have survived endless drops and scuffs. They also come with three sizes of soft earpieces so you‚Äôre sure to find a size that is comfortable for your particular ear. These are great contenders against any bigger name brand alternatives!
Awesome, I love these earbuds so much. Versatile. I can use one and easily control everything.

Really good sound, but... for a $50 pair of earbuds, these sound impressive. I've paid twice the price before and not been nearly this impressed. They bring a new clarity of sound to some albums in which I have been previously disappointed, e.g., Clockwork Angels, which has always sounded muddy, even on my custom home sound system. My music tastes have a wide range; whether classical, big band jazz, prog rock, shoegazer, etc., these buds really deliver for the price. With the app, there is good ability to adjust the sound and other settings, which is very nice, if not unique to JBL. However, there is one big caveat. With all the earbuds I have used over the years, I have never, ever had such a pain-in-the-*$$ time getting these darn things out of their charging case!! They are stupidly hard to grasp-- they sit deep in the case, don't have a good way to grab them, and the lid very much is in the way of trying to get to them. If you buy these, know you have to be very careful and deliberate about removing them from the case or you will definitely drop them and ultimately ruin them. And if you have big fingers, seriously consider another product...unless you just get a kick out of being extremely frustrated. JBL, if you're listening (sorry for the pun), redesign the case so the earbuds rest in them 180 degrees from the way they do now, increase the surface area to pull them out, and please, please, redesign the case to have the lid flip farther back out of the way so that people with even average-sized fingers can get to these earbuds!
Great product! I gifted these to my husband, who is picky about headphone audio quality. He loves them and uses them for work every day and when he's doing upkeep around our yard.

Exceptional sound!!! I've heard dozens of earbuds over the years, about a decade or so, and I find these fit the bill just right. I am not a big fan of JBL buds; these are very close to the Bose ones that I own that are wired. Great sound, just got them today, Wednesday the 19th, 2024. I would highly recommend these earbuds for those who don't want to break the bank and get something affordable as these are. Love them so far; plan to use them at the gym tomorrow to accommodate the courtesy of not blasting my music next to other people who are trying to enjoy their workout.
I love these, hands down the best earbuds yet I‚Äôve purchased. They are pretty snug in the ear but while working have fallen out. That‚Äôs the only thing I dislike. Sound quality is top-notch.

Great sound!!! Wow! I never review stuff, but, these earbuds are so killer!! An app you can download to control the EQ! The loudest, bass-heavy buds I‚Äôve found, at any price point!! I listen to house and techno, so finding enough full sound is tricky without an over-ear headphone. These rock! Super comfy and sleek, with plenty of tap controls. I sure am glad I lost my iPods!
Pretty good sound, low battery life. Sound is pretty clear but the battery life isn‚Äôt that great.
Excellent! Met our expectations. Works great with good sound and great battery life.
Sound works great.
JBL Vibe Beam amazing!
Love it!! I use them all the time and the charging lasts me a week. They are really easy to set up on the app!!

These are great. These earbuds are great. I have small ears and I've tried so many different earbuds, but these are the ones that stay in for long periods of time. Still falls out every now and then, but not as much as other ones.
stereo great stereo sound!!
bass the bass could be a little better..

Really impressed!!! I bought for around 45 bucks and to some extent it really outperforms my over-ear headphones which are much more expensive than this one. The only thing that bothers me is, it drains the battery too fast (both buds and charger). But that's not too bad. Overall, really worth the price.

I love these things! I use them every day. No joke. I am in construction and always would buy the earbuds that would fit over the ear because these style earbuds never fit right, and I was always worried I'd lose them. These were on sale, and I thought I'd give them a try. JBL has always made pretty good products, and I love my JBL portable speakers! Wow! They fit great! I can use them all day without any ear discomfort. They have seriously fallen out of my ear maybe a total of 3 times since I've owned them, and that's everything from jumping off trailers to jumping on shovels. These things have started in no problem! The sound is pretty great if you ask me. I've also never bought any high-end earbuds or headphones to compare to, and the same goes for any ANC or fancy features of those sorts. I can tell you they work pretty well from the knowledge I know and the use I have with them! I'd highly recommend them to anyone looking for a quality product without spending an arm and a leg. And for the price, if I did lose one, it wouldn't be the end of the world!

pleasant scent, effective cleaner. I love the delicate verbena scent in Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day multi-surface cleaner. It‚Äôs very mild compared to other common household cleaners like Mr. Clean (Mr. Clean is one that knocks me over, and I can‚Äôt stand the smell). Many years ago it was fine, but the scent has changed and become stronger, and not for the better. Manufacturers on the whole use way too much scent in their products, whether it‚Äôs laundry detergent, fabric softener, hygiene products, and anything else that scent is added to. Just take a walk down the detergent aisle of your grocery store, and if you aren‚Äôt immune to scent, you will find it overwhelming. This cleaner is not overpowering and smells just like verbena, a fresh, clean, green smell. I also love the way it cleans my wood floors, sinks, countertops, stainless steel fridge, stove & dishwasher, & everything else I clean with it. It leaves the surfaces ‚Äúsqueaky clean‚Äù without any streaks. Is it a good deep cleaning cleaner? I don‚Äôt know for sure since I‚Äôve never used it to clean up muddy, greasy, grimy, dirty areas in my home. It does remove dark marks on painted walls, but I haven‚Äôt tried it on heavy dirt and grime. I imagine it‚Äôs comparable to Murphy's Oil Soap, which is another brand I love and have used for years. If the scent of cleaners is an issue for you, and you like verbena, you should love this cleaner. A little bit goes a long way in a bucket of water (for washing floors, etc.). I usually use a lot less than is recommended (in everything from laundry detergent to household cleaners), especially my laundry detergent. I used to use the recommended amount and found with concentrated products, the amount recommended is way too much. I could feel the soap in my clothing after the wash cycle finished. I had to re-rinse all my loads. Then I got smart and cut way down on detergent and included vinegar in the final rinse cycle. Manufacturers love to sell more product, so don‚Äôt go by what they state on the container. Use your own wise judgment. On a side note, I love Costco‚Äôs industrial-strength powdered laundry detergent, but I cut way back to 1/4 cup per medium to large loads. The white dress shirts and T-shirts are much brighter & whiter compared with many other detergents I‚Äôve used in the past. I highly recommend this product for all of the above reasons. Give it a try at least once. You may love it too!

I don‚Äôt think it kills all germs, so I wouldn‚Äôt use it in the bathroom. The bottles have never leaked on me, and I‚Äôve never had anything be discolored or damaged after using this cleaner. Also a bug deterrent, I buy the lemon verbena concentrate and mix it with water in a spray bottle (about 50/50). My condo association allows the renting of units, and unfortunately, one of those renters moved in with roaches - and over time - the entire building had to deal with roaches. We pay for exterminators monthly for inside and out - and honestly - if there was an improvement, it wasn't obvious. One day I saw a roach in my kitchen - and those dang things are faster than your hand and manage to scurry away before you can smash them. I spritzed one with my lemon verbena spray - and it was paralyzed. It wasn't killed - but it didn't know what to do. I've since learned that roaches hate verbena the way mosquitoes hate citronella. Verbena and citronella are related - and even have a similar scent. I've conquered the roach issue by spraying all around my kitchen every night before bed (sink, appliances, inside cupboards, countertops - and near wall sockets, which are entry points). I also spray around my bathroom sink and drain, counter, and wall sockets. This habit has been remarkably successful. Next, I will spray a test area of grass outside my condo where neighboring dogs like to relieve themselves to see if it deters dogs while not killing grass (will report back). :)

Great non-harsh chemical cleaner I'm reviewing the lemon verbena scent. A little goes a long way! I've been looking into getting rid of using the harsh chemicals in my life both for myself and the health of my family. The list of possible side effects of the commonly purchased store cleaners continues to grow. I don't want to worry about taking anyone to the ER or calling the CDC for an accident with those products... not to mention, natural cleaners are better for the environment. My usual natural cleaner is white vinegar with a few drops of dish soap. This can be a bit harsh as far as scent. This is still my go-to for heavy cleaning or light disinfecting, but I wanted a more pleasant means of general cleaning. I'm new to the line of Mrs. Meyer's cleaning products. I've recently been using the laundry detergent and decided to try some of their other products. I've tried this cleaner on fresh grease splatters, floors, windows (left no streaks surprisingly), all around my kitchen counter and splashboard... so far those surfaces and jobs were tackled flawlessly. I'm in love with the scent. I can't get enough of it. It's a refreshing clean smell... not lemony though, so don't be fooled by the name of it. Lemon verbena is an herb which is supposed to smell like lemon... although in this cleaner, I don't think so. It's not a floral scent either. It's just very pleasant. For my general cleaning, the ratio I've been using is 32 oz of water to 2 oz of the cleaner. I purchased spray bottles for a couple of dollars and they'll last a couple of years. I bought this from the seller Amazon.com LLC, which I feel is important to list this info. I've come across sellers with variances in their items, including knockoffs, even if listed as the same brand.

Best cleaner around As a homeowner, I'm always on the lookout for effective and efficient cleaning products, especially when it comes to tackling tough stains and grime. The Pink Stuff - The Miracle All-Purpose Cleaning Paste has truly lived up to its name and exceeded my expectations. It has worked wonders in completely cleaning my bathroom tiles and grouts, transforming them from dull and stained to sparkling and pristine. In this review, I'll share my experience with The Pink Stuff and why it has become an indispensable part of my cleaning routine. Powerful cleaning action: The Pink Stuff's cleaning paste boasts an incredible cleaning action that easily removes stubborn stains and grime from bathroom tiles and grouts. I was astonished at how effortlessly it tackled soap scum, water stains, and dirt build-up that had accumulated over time. With just a small amount of the paste and a bit of scrubbing, my tiles and grouts were restored to their original shine and cleanliness. Effective on different surfaces: What impressed me the most about The Pink Stuff is its versatility. It is not only perfect for bathroom tiles and grouts but also works wonders on other surfaces throughout the house. I've used it on sinks, countertops, stovetops, and even outdoor furniture with equally remarkable results. The fact that one product can tackle various cleaning tasks is a huge plus for me. Gentle on surfaces: Despite its powerful cleaning action, The Pink Stuff is surprisingly gentle on surfaces. I had concerns about using an abrasive cleaner on my tiles and grouts, but this cleaning paste did not cause any damage or scratches. It effectively cleaned without compromising the integrity of the surfaces, which is a critical aspect for me when choosing a cleaning product. Easy application and quick results: Using The Pink Stuff is a breeze. I simply apply a small amount of the paste onto a damp cloth or sponge and gently scrub the tiles and grouts. The paste adheres well to the surface, ensuring maximum cleaning power. What's even more impressive is how quickly I saw results. In just a few minutes of cleaning, the difference was evident, and my bathroom looked noticeably cleaner. Pleasant scent: I appreciate that The Pink Stuff has a mild and pleasant scent. It's not overpowering like some other cleaning products, which can be bothersome during cleaning sessions. The subtle scent leaves the bathroom smelling fresh and clean without being too overwhelming. Affordable and long-lasting: A little goes a long way with The Pink Stuff. The small tub of cleaning paste lasts a surprisingly long time, making it an affordable and cost-effective option. It's great to know that I don't have to constantly restock, as a small amount of the paste is enough for thorough cleaning. Conclusion: In conclusion, The Pink Stuff - The Miracle All-Purpose Cleaning Paste has become my go-to cleaning product for effectively and completely cleaning my bathroom tiles and grouts. Its powerful cleaning action, gentle yet versatile nature, and pleasant scent have made it a joy to use. The fact that it's affordable and long-lasting is an added bonus. I highly recommend The Pink Stuff to anyone seeking a reliable and efficient cleaning solution that truly lives up to its promise of being a miracle cleaning paste. It has made a significant difference in the cleanliness and appearance of my bathroom, and I'm confident it will do the same for others looking for top-notch cleaning results.

Coffee splattered in places I didn't think it could get, including all over me burning me horribly. I had to make a mad dash to urgent care for treatment so the coffee had time to soak into the stucco and dry. I knew I was facing an impossible mission cleaning the walls by the time I got home. I was so badly burned on my chest and neck that I really couldn't clean the mess even when I wanted to. Finally, two weeks later, it was time to get it clean. I dampened the stucco, stepped away from the wall, sprayed twice, and wiped. I had to wait a few minutes and repeat. Voila! Squeaky clean. No hard scrubbing, sweating, or pain! Do yourself a favor and get this stuff. If it can remove coffee stains from stucco, I can't wait to fully recover from my burns to try it on more impossible stains.
